title: Whole Slide Image Classification of Salivary Gland Tumours
authors: John Charlton, Ibrahim Alsanie, Syed Ali Khurram
abstract:
This work shows promising results using multiple instance learning on
salivary gland tumours in classifying cancers on whole slide images. Utilising
CTransPath as a patch-level feature extractor and CLAM as a feature aggregator,
an F1 score of over 0.88 and AUROC of 0.92 are obtained for detecting cancer in
whole slide images.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Image and Video Processing
Computing Research Repository/Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
